frontmatter.title: Install antivirus - particularly on mobile
frontmatter.description: Not every mobile device, in particular older ones, comes with a sufficient antivirus. Check your deviceâ€™s standard protection, and perhaps consider installing a separate antivirus for an extra layer of protection. There are many free options available in the App/Play store. Install one of these now and have a look at what features it includes.

frontmatter.title: Manual backup to separate device, kept elsewhere
Create a log of all of the data that is important to you
